title: What I expect tahm kench one for all to be.

replies.body:
Wait... can a tahm eat a tahm, who ate a tahm, who ate a tahm, who ate a tahm, who ate a tahm? and if so is this considered tahmseption???
{{champion:223}}
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2rnhnr8MTco

{{champion:223}}  can eat a {{champion:223}}, who ate a {{champion:223}}, who ate a {{champion:223}}, who ate a {{champion:223}}, who ate an {{champion:92}} and this is the one time a Riven tower dive will have gone wrong because the Tahms could just rush to nexus fountain with her with the speedboost.

I hate to be the party pooper, but tahm is probably unable to be eaten by an ally tahm while he is holding an enemy. Tahm is immune to ally displacement while he has an enemy swallowed, kalista ult waits until he spits them out, he can't flash, and I don't think he can grab lantern.

But... I don't see any reason you can't make a tahm train in one tahm

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bxLKZdzxE_w

It's possible.
what's possible? Kalista didn't even ult that fight.
" tahm is probably unable to be eaten while he is holding an enemy. " This video showed otherwise. This was never about Kalista.

I meant by tahms on the same team... I even went on to explain that this specifically referred to his allies ability's, not enemies.

But apparently I was still wrong anyways because someone posted a video above of what I was talking about.
Nice edit.
"I misunderstood what you meant; oh man, you edited to make it more clear? Loser." Really?

I'm pretty sure that Tahm only gets a speed boost based on if its just an ally, not how many. So, if the last Tahm eats a ally, its a speed boost, but if he eats a enemy last, his speed decreases. Since Tahm ate a ally last, it will just be a speed boost but in this One for All, everyone gets the same champion on both sides. Riven just broke more than her sword if she's in this game.

Yeah I didn't think that they stacked, but a speed boost is still a speed boost (but also, the fact more than one Tahm can get the boost means more distance can be covered theoretically in between Devours). I was just referring to how Riven's towerdiving potential would be mitigated since now Tahm has an effective strat to actually force one to her demise.
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/59502536.jpg

Wait, if that is a tahmseption, what does time behave like inside a tahm's tahm?

 Maybe you stay longer inside than you actually do in the real world, and if that is so, can we considered the game will be divided in a number of different realities, equal to the number of Tahm's in a Tahm?

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/d0/d0374478557798edfc964afd006512de457207f70346d8e2ef524a98afd73578.jpg
If thats an option its gonna be hilarious to see each tahm eat one another then have the 4th jump into the 5ths ult and all 5 pop up randomly

When you have 3 stacks from Tahm and suddenly they all look at you. 

http://38.media.tumblr.com/3b27499905b9db8b1b2d5c4ce162fd2b/tumblr_inline_mou0mzheQM1qz4rgp.jpg
Mine?
When do they start the http://www.mobafire.com/images/ability/sion-cannibalism.png ?

Way too *fancy* for that, kind sir.
http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/2014-06/14/11/enhanced/webdr03/anigif_enhanced-18319-1402759310-1.gif

> [{quoted}](name=DemaciaClown,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BgruOk0G,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-10-05T20:46:27.349+0000)

You seem a bit _clueless_ my dear friend.

just a gathering of the rare pepes

nothin to see here peeps
they are trying to click each others ults
Tahm is not a frog, he is a catfish.

ffs Tahm is a blobfish.
http://s11.postimg.org/v0hcdiv4f/PSMix_2015_10_06_21_30_57.jpg?noCache=1444163573
Wait, so are they implementing One for All?
Comes with patch 5.20
Did they say if it was going to be permanent or not?
I don't think they said it but I believe it will only last for patch 5.20 A.K.A. 2 weeks.

Wow.... An Over the Garden Wall gif on the LoL boards?

ily op
Tought this were the dota boards, sorry I'll delete.
What will happen to the game if two Tahms tried to eat each other at the same time?
So 5 of them just eat one guy and he's dead.
eating someone removes the stacks so i doubt all 5 will eat someone

> [{quoted}](name=Nunya Bezwacks,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BgruOk0G,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2015-10-06T03:16:54.163+0000)
>
> eating someone removes the stacks so i doubt all 5 will eat someone

It's plausible. 3 q one, then eat him. Have 3 sorrow do the eaten guy and auto, eat him again, make it hell for him.
Lenny face.

Been playing Tahm Kench One-For-All on the PBE..
Can confirm

10/10 - IGN

- Too much water
The sweetest lies of all.
I laughed far too much over this
But its 6 6-3 =3  3 equals 3 corneres = ILUMINATI CONFIRMED! DAM DAM DAM!!
